title: Savoring Downtown Gourmet Lunch in Kinshicho
description: Discover a diverse array of lunch options in Kinshicho, the station closest to Tokyo Skytree. From handcrafted udon and authentic Indian curry to lively beer restaurants, we introduce unique lunch spots that capture the essence of Tokyo's traditional downtown atmosphere.
content:
# Savoring Downtown Gourmet Lunch in Kinshicho

Kinshicho, with its excellent access to Tokyo Skytree, is an area where modern commercial facilities stand alongside streets that retain a charming downtown atmosphere. Here, time-honored flavors coexist with new establishments, offering a diverse range of lunch spots. Come and enjoy a delicious lunch in Kinshicho's uniquely warm and welcoming downtown setting.

## Stone-Milled Udon Specialty Shop

<Place id="ChIJ1aMjSNGIGGARhlGB9AH0A3A" />

This specialty restaurant in Kinshicho offers authentic, handcrafted udon. Made by artisans using carefully stone-milled wheat flour, the udon boasts a wonderfully firm chewiness ('koshi') and a distinctive wheat aroma. The dashi broth is also crafted with carefully selected ingredients, resulting in an exquisitely deep and flavorful soup. During lunch, they offer a wide array of set menus, including tempura and onigiri. It's a truly authentic udon lunch experience right in the heart of downtown.

## Authentic Indian Curry

<Place id="ChIJuYRacpyTGGARI7P22YrduYk" />

Discover an authentic Indian curry experience at this cafe & restaurant in Kinshicho. Their genuinely spicy curries allow you to choose your preferred heat level, letting you customize the flavor to your liking. They offer a rich selection of set menus with naan or rice, ensuring a satisfying and generous meal. During lunchtime, their affordable sets are particularly popular. Come and savor the true taste of India right here in Kinshicho.

## Craft Beer Restaurant

<Place id="ChIJjV0wzymJGGAREuw-gh-sCjU" />

This beer restaurant in Kinshicho is the perfect spot to enjoy craft beer paired with delicious food. During lunch hours, they offer Western-style dishes specifically designed to complement their beers, allowing you to enjoy a leisurely meal with a brew even in the daytime. The cuisine is genuinely authentic, featuring a menu thoughtfully curated for optimal beer pairing. It's highly recommended for lunch with colleagues or a relaxed weekend meal.

## A Fulfilling Lunchtime in Kinshicho

From stone-milled udon and authentic Indian curry to vibrant craft beer restaurants, Kinshicho offers an array of captivating lunch spots that combine downtown warmth with culinary diversity. Why not combine your Tokyo Skytree sightseeing with a unique lunch experience that only Kinshicho can offer?
